programme.title: Rakett 69
programme.desc: Raketlased võtavad suuna kosmosesse ja panevad kokku satelliidi. Kuid kaks meeskonna poolt peavad töötama eraldi ja ideaalseks koostööks efektiivselt infot vahetama. Kes aga jääb satelliidi ehitamisel napilt võidust ilma, saab end tõestada kaugseire satelliidipilte võrreldes. Konkurents on väga tihe ja võidud eriti napid. Tootja Vesilind OÜ.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Aki ja Emilia alustavad kärbsepüügihooaega Lyngenis, samal ajal on Riitta ning Tomi Inari kevade armul. Riikka ja Niko otsivad lõunarannikult hallhüljest. Manu jahib kobrast traditsioonilisel viisil.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Jaapanis
programme.desc: Viimases osas sõidab Joanna Lumley Shikoku saarele, et õppida paremini tundma Jaapani budismi. Ta külastab robothotelli Kyushu saarel ja kooli Nagasakis. Kohama saarel pakub muusikalise elamuse bänd, mille liikmete keskmine vanus on 84.

programme.title: Tippkohtumine
programme.desc: Meelelahutussaade, kus uue tähenduse saavad ETV ajaloo kõige naljakamad, veidramad, hullemad, kämbimad ja lihtsalt uskumatumad saatelõigud ehk tippude tipud. Stuudios võtavad üksteiselt mõõtu kaks meeskonda, mida juhivad Rohke Debelakk ja Urmas Vaino. Nende ülesandeks on arhiivimaterjal tolmuvabaks kommenteerida vastavalt saatejuht Anu Välba poolt seatud ülesandele. Stsenarist Villu Kangur, režissöör Maire Radsin. Tootjad Thors Production ja ERR.

programme.title: Veetee
programme.desc: Pärast mitut tööpäeva ja enne Tänassilma jõelaadsesse jõkke minekut võtame pooliku puhkepäeva ja saame targemaks. Ivo isa imeline angerjasupp ja kohaäkis. Võrtsu järvekaru Ants räägib kalede tegemisest. Põikame üle järve limnoloogiajaama, kus Heli viib meid kalade uskumatusse maailma. Pääru ulatab abikäe piraajade akvaariumi puhastamiseks ja räägime doktor Arvo Tuvikesega angerjatest. Vetelpäästekoerad Puru ja Bandit ning nende perenaine Angela teevad Pääru peal näitliku õppetunni. Meiega liitub uus veeteeline Eleryn Tiit. Lisaks vee ja muid tarkusi. Operaatorid Rain Nirgi ja Lemo, sarja autor Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.

programme.title: Petturid
Charade
programme.desc: Rež: Stanley Donen, os: Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn. 1950. aastate üks olulisemaid Hollywoodi menufilmide lavastajaid Stanley Donen ("Lauldes vihmas", "Seitse pruuti seitsmele vennale") viib selles romantilises ja ootamatute süžeepööretega kelmikomöödias kokku kaks oma aja suurimat staari - Cary Granti ja Audrey Hepburni. Kaunis pariislanna Regina Lambert (Audrey Hepburn) leiab puhkusereisilt tagasi koju jõudes eest paljaksröövitud korteri. Naine saab teada, et tema abikaasa, kes elas topeltelu, põgenes teadmata suunas koos 250 000 dollariga ja on nüüd mõrvatud. Kuna raha surnukeha juurest ei leitud, hakkavad süütut naist ahistama kolm kurikaela, kes kõik olid kunagi tema mehega seotud. Olukorda tuleb päästma puhkusel kohatud hurmur Peter Joshua (Cary Grant), kellesse Regina ülepeakaela armub. Kuid kui šarmantne džentelmen hakkab pikapeale ise käituma kahtlaselt, peab naine otsustama, kas meest umbusaldada või anda ennast tema hoole alla. Etteaimamatu puändiga komöödias lööb kaasa tugev näitlejate ansambel, kus peaosalisi kehastanud Hepburni ja Granti kõrval teevad meeldejäävad rollisooritused tuntud koomikud Walter Matthau ning James Coburn. Hittfilmidega nagu „Puhkus Roomas“ (1953), "Ühe nunna elulugu" (1959) ja "Hommikueine Tiffany juures" (1960) kuulsaks saanud Audrey Hepburn (1929-1993) oli filmi valmimise aegu oma karjääri tippvormis. Juba 1930. aastatel koomikuna filmikarjääri alustanud ja hiljem mitmes Alfred Hitchcocki kriminullis („Loodest põhja poole“, „Kurikuulus“ jt) osalenud Cary Grantile (1904-1986) jäi „Petturid“ aga üheks viimaseks tööks, kus ta kaasa tegi. Filmist valmisid ka mitmed töötlused ja uusversioonid, viimane neist 2003. aastal hindikeelsena. Audrey Hepburn pälvis Regina rolli eest parima naisnäitleja BAFTA auhinna.

programme.desc: Aki ja Emilia alustavad kärbsepüügihooaega Lyngenis, samal ajal on Riitta ning Tomi Inari kevade armul. Riikka ja Niko otsivad lõunarannikult hallhüljest. Manu jahib kobrast traditsioonilisel viisil.

programme.title: Slaalom
Slalom
programme.desc: Lyz Lopez (Noée Abita) on 15-aastane lootustandev suusataja, kes võetakse vastu Pantsusmaa Alpides tegutsevasse rangesse spordiakadeemiasse. Treeningkeskust juhatab endine suusaäss Fred (Jérémie Rener), kes paneb kasvandikele karmi füüsilise ja emotsionaalse pinge peale. Lyz talub raskusi ja edeneb sportlasena hästi, ent mida aeg edasi, seda enam paistab, et Fredi huvi tüdruku vastu ei piirdu ainult sportliku poolega. 2020. aasta PÖFFil laste ja noortefilmide festivali Just Film grand prix. R: Charlène Favier.

programme.title: Leiutajateküla Lotte
programme.desc: Kusagil Euroopas suure mere ääres asub Leiutajateküla, kus on au sees igasuguste majapidamises kasulike vigurite meisterdamine. Igal aastal korraldavad külaelanikud uute leiutiste võistluse. Üks kuulsamaid leiutajaid külas on energilise koeratüdruk Lotte isa Oskar. Tema peamiseks rivaaliks on jänes Adalbert, kelle abikaasagi kogu hingest võistlusest osa võtab. Võit oleks oluline suguvõsale ja teeks au kogu jäneste klannile. Järjekordse leiutiste võistluse eelõhtul leiavad Lotte ja tema sõber kassipoeg Bruno merest vettinud raamatu. Raamatu vahelt ronib välja mesilane Susumu, aednik kaugest Jaapanist. Susumu õpetab külaelanikele võistluste eel mõned judoheited, mida viimased hakkavad agaralt kasutama oma igapäevaelu hõlbustamiseks. Külaelanike arvates on judost isegi enam abi majapidamistöödes kui keerulistest ja tõrksatest masinatest. Lavastajad Janno Põldma ja Heiki Ernits. Osades Evelin Pang, Andero Ermel, Peeter Oja, Lembit Ulfsak, Marko Matvere, Ain Lutsep, Aarne Üksküla ja paljud teised. Originaalmuusika loojaks Sven Grünberg. Tootja Eesti Joonisfilm, kaastootja Rija Films. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.

One Republic in Concert. Baloise Session 2022
programme.desc: OneRepublic rõõmustab oma fänne hittidega “Apologize”, “All the Right Moves”, “Secrets” , “Good Life”, “Run” ja “Rescue Me”.(n)

programme.title: Salisbury mürgitamised
programme.desc: 2018. aasta märtsis olid kõigi pilgud Inglismaa väikelinnal Salisburyl, kus Vene närvimürgiga püüti tappa endist Vene salaagenti Sergei Skripali ja tema tütart. See sari põhineb asjaosaliste meenutustel ja kogemustel ning jälgib sündmuste käiku samm-sammult. 1. osa. Kui pargipingil üks vanem mees ja noorem naine kokku varisevad, kahtlustatakse esialgu üledoosi. Ent kui selgub, et mees on endine salaagent ja tegu võib olla üliohtliku närvimürgiga, käivitatakse Salisburys suuroperatsioon.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Täna ärkab Hannes nõiana ja kohtab Merlinit, kes röövib Ropsi, kuna Hannes pole nõus tema eest pliid kullaks muutma.(n)

programme.title: Minu rüütel ja mina
programme.desc: Paha-Jaak piirab lossi ning Juku ja Kats peavad leidma midagi, mis paneks teda varakambri rüüstamise plaanist loobuma. Nad pöörduvad abi saamiseks Björni poole, kes soovitab neile uut liitlast.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Saara ja Miia on valmis maja koristama ning süüa tegema, kui vaid Saara ema lubaks Peppinol nende juurde jääda. Tsentoopias vohab Ööväät aina võimsamalt. Kui selle okas kuningas Rainorit ja kuninganna Mailat torkab, vajuvad nood sügavasse unne. Miia, Mo ja Juko peavad leidma viisi kuningapere äratamiseks.(n)

programme.title: Pips ja Popi
programme.desc: Pips ja Popi lähevad lompidesse hüppama.(n)

programme.title: Kirbu-Krants
programme.desc: Rex peab osalema politseikoerte võistlusel, aga kõik kisub algusest peale rappa.(n)

programme.title: Muumioru lood
programme.desc: Talv jõuab kätte ja Muumioru asukad on segaduses, sest muumiperet pole ikka veel. Ühel päeval saabub orgu uus loomake, kelle lennukas kujutlusvõime hakkab kõiki eksitama.(n)

programme.title: Maagilised kangelased
Die Wolf-Gäng
programme.desc: Vampiir, kes ei talu verd silmaotsaski; haldjas, kes kardab lennata ja libahunt, kellel on loomakarvade allergia – teismelised Vlad, Faye ning Wolf on seetõttu maailmakuulsa nõiakooli, Penneri Akadeemia, naerualused. Kuid kolmik hoiab kokku ja nimetab end Wolfi Kambaks, et koos paljastada salajane vandenõu, mida hauvad linnapea ning tema sekretär, mis tähendaks lõppu Crailsfeldeni linnale ja selle haldjatest, nõidadest, trollidest, kääbustest ning vampiiridest elanikkonnale. Fantastilises seikluses teevad kaasa tipp-koomikud Rick Kavanian ja Axel Stein. Saksamaa ühe edukama fantastika- ja ulmekirjaniku Wolfgang Hohlbeini raamatu filmiversioon.(n)

programme.title: Nõialuud ja kõik muud
Room on the Broom
programme.desc: Kui nõid ja tema kass luua seljas läbi tormise taeva tuhisevad, puhub tuul kõigepealt minema nõia mütsi, siis juuksepaela ning lõpuks võlukepi. Õnneks aitavad vastutulelikud loomad nõial kaotatud asjad üles leida. Vastutasuks paluvad nad luba luuale elama asuda. Muinasjutuloo jutustab Maria Annus.(n)

programme.title: Rahvusülikooli sajand
programme.desc: Kes on ühe ülikooli kõige tähtsamad inimesed? Loomulikult üliõpilased! Tudengipõlv on ikka ilusaim aeg inimese elus ning seda hoolimata riigikorrast ja majanduslikest oludest. Kaheksas saade võrdleb tänast tudengielu sõjaeelse ja nõukogudeaegse Tartu üliõpilaseluga.(n)

programme.title: Kümme kaadrit
programme.desc: Legendaarne dirigent Tõnu Kaljuste on fotoalbumist välja valinud kümme unikaalset kaadrit oma elust. Saatejuht Kristjan Jõekalda.(n)

programme.title: Daniel Day-Lewis, Hollywoodi geenius
Daniel Day-Lewis: L'héritier
programme.desc: Ta on ainus näitleja filmiajaloos, kes on võitnud kolm Oscarit. Tema mitmekesised rollid ulatuvad aristokraatidest pisisulide ja lindpriideni ning tema anne on köitnud kõige kuulsamaid režissööre Scorsesest Spielbergini. Day-Lewis on ka üks valivamaid näitlejaid, kes see-eest valitud töösse sukeldub ennastunustava pühendumusega.(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Max üritab oma murtud südamega patsienti aidata. Sonja kitsikus kasvab aina suuremaks. Nikke kojutulekuga kaasnevad probleemid. Aino üritab pulmakorralduse ja tööde vahel tasakaalu leida.(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Jesse osutub liiga võluvaks, et kiusliku patsiendiga tegeleda. Ilmari tunneb, et jaks hakkab lõppema. Kirurgi ja õe erimeelsused opisaalis kasvavad sõnasõjaks.(n)

programme.title: OneRepublic Baloise Sessionil
One Republic in Concert. Baloise Session 2022
programme.desc: OneRepublic rõõmustab oma fänne hittidega “Apologize”, “All the Right Moves”, “Secrets” , “Good Life”, “Run” ja “Rescue Me”.(n)

programme.title: Siin ja praegu
programme.desc: Saate külaliseks on Pärnu Endla näitleja Jaan Rekkor. 3. aprillil on Jaan Rekkoril 65. sünnipäev. Palju õnne!(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Jaapanis
programme.desc: Viimases osas sõidab Joanna Lumley Shikoku saarele, et õppida paremini tundma Jaapani budismi. Ta külastab robothotelli Kyushu saarel ja kooli Nagasakis. Kohama saarel pakub muusikalise elamuse bänd, mille liikmete keskmine vanus on 84.(n)

programme.title: Raamatupood
The Entertainer
programme.desc: Fran õpib klaverit, Bernard armub, Manny tahab lihtsalt puhata. Aga kes saaks puhata, kui Fran valetab armsale pimedale ja Bernard petab oma armastatud publikut.(n)

programme.title: Lotte ja kuukivi saladus
programme.desc: Ühel ööl juhtub Leiutajatekülas midagi ootamatut - kaks salapärast tundmatut hiilivad külla ja otsivad läbi vana rännukoer Klausi kohvri. Klaus ja Lotte asuvad asja uurima. Peagi saab selgeks, et otsitakse taga kolme salapärast kuukivi, mida Klaus oma viimaselt matkalt mägedes leidis. Klaus ja Lotte otsustavad külastada Klausi rännukaaslasi, kelle kätte jäid kaks ülejäänud kivi. Varsti selgub, et leidub veel teisigi, kes ihaldavad endale kolme müstilist kuukivi. Stsenaarium Janno Põldma, Heiki Ernits, Andrus Kivirähk, režissöörid Janno Põldma, Heiki Ernits, dialoogid Andrus Kivirähk. Osades Lotte - Evelin Pang, Klaus - Margus Tabor, kärbes Jaak - Mait Malmsten, kuujänes Tik - Mikk Jürjens, kuujänes Rihv - Tõnu Oja, koer Fred - Lembit Ulfsak, kass Paul - Priit Võigemast, siga Voldemar - Tiit Sukk, lehm Benita - Merle Palmiste, Lotte isa Oskar - Lembit Ulfsak, Lotte ema Anna - Garmen Tabor, ämblik Ernst - Elina Reinold, koer Ville - Tõnu Kark, kass Matilda - Anne Reeman, papagoi Anu Lamp, hüljes Leo - Hannes Kaljujärv, lumelõvi Hannes - Hannes Kaljujärv, unenäo kaelkirjak - Garmen Tabor, haigusemehike Uno - Elina Reinold, kuujänes Tuhh - Veiko Tubin. Episoodides Anu Lamp, Tõnu Oja, Jaak Prints, Sandra Üksküla Uusberg, Kristjan Üksküla, Jaan Lätti, Aldo Jakovlev, Lemme Vaher, Emma Koppel. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Liselottel tuli tuju tantsida, aga perenaine tüdines sellest millegipärast väga kiiresti ära.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Saara tutvustab Miiale kõiki nende talus olevaid loomi. Kui Miiat Tsentoopiasse kutsutakse, selgub seal, et paanide kuningal on samasugune kristall nagu see, mille Mo isa aardekirstust leidis. Kas neist kahest aga piisab kuninga ja kuninganna äratamiseks?(n)

programme.title: Käsipalli EM valikmäng
programme.desc: Käsipalli Euroopa meistrivõistluste valiksari lõpeb Eesti koondise jaoks tõeliselt suures käsipalliriigis, Islandil. Väikesaare käsipallimeeskond on võitnud olümpia hõbemedali ja EM-i pronksi, samuti on MM-il jõutud viie parema sekka. Kommenteerib Tarmo Tiisler, reporter Aet Süvari.(n)

programme.title: Iga pink räägib loo
programme.desc: Vahur Kersna teekond Väärikate Kulgejate radadel. Omanimeline pink püstitatakse Kaika Lainele. Režissöör Andres Lepasar, toimetaja Iiris Saluri, produtsent Hannela Lippus.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrummi raamatud
programme.desc: Möödus 20 aastat Andrus Kivirähki romaani "Rehepapp" esmatrükist, mille puhul on teosest ilmunud juubeliväljaanne. Romaanis tegutseb lisaks inimestele arvukalt kratte, luupainajaid ja teisi eesti folkloorist tuttavaid tegelasi. Miks on niisugused fantastilised olendid eesti uuemas kirjanduses jätkuvalt olulised? Kohtuvad kirjanik Andrus Kivirähk, hiljuti lasteraamatuga "Allikahaldjas" debüteerinud bioloog Tuul Sepp ja folklorist Ülo Valk. Vestlust suunab Joonas Hellerma. Toimetajad Hedi Rosma ja Johanna Ross, režissöör Erle Veber.(n)

programme.title: Vahur Kersna 40/60
programme.desc: 1990. aastal tõstis saatesari "Monoloog tundmatuga" seni avalikkusele tundmatu Vormsi ennu Eesti esinõia staatusesse. Erinevalt tänasest kirevast karussellist, kus tiirlevad mustad ja valged nõiad, kaardimoorid, astroloogid, sensitiivid, šamaanid ning selgeltnägijad on orienteeritud eelkõige kommertsedule, mõjus materiaalse maailma suhtes ükskõikne enn korraga nii mänglevalt kui ka veenvalt - jättes mulje, et ta tõesti ka teab, mida räägib.(n)

programme.title: Libahundi needus
programme.desc: Noor näitlejanna hakkab mängima "Libahundis" Tiinat. Teatris aga kummitab, proovidel lasub needus, mänguverest saab päris veri... Näitlejanna hakkab uurima kummituslugu, mis viib teda ajas tagasi vanade teatrilegendide ja intriigide juurde. Koomiline mõrvamüsteerium kulgeb läbi kolme erineva ajastu - aastad 1911, 1954 ja 2005 Vanemuise teatris. Peaosas Katariina Lauk, stsenaristid Ilmar Raag, Rainer Sarnet, Margus Kasterpalu, operaator Janno-Hans Arro, režissöör Rainer Sarnet. Tootjad Eesti Televisioon ja Shop of Dreams.(n)

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: During the early days of World War II, the fate of Western Europe hangs on the newly-appointed British Prime Minister Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Hitler, or go to war.

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: When Henry “Hank” Palmer, a lawyer, returns to his hometown to attend his mother's funeral, he discovers that his estranged father, Joseph Palmer, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank must now defend his father in court against a prosecutor determined to have him put away.

programme.title: Official Secrets
programme.desc: In the run-up to the invasion of Iraq, British Intelligence whistle-blower Katharine Gun leaked a memo about a joint spying between the US and UK, proposing to blackmail smaller member states to vote for the war in Iraq. Journalist Martin Bright published that document in The Observer newspaper and the Security Council was outraged.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: During the early days of World War II, the fate of Western Europe hangs on the newly-appointed British Prime Minister Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Hitler, or go to war.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: After two secret agents are married and retired, they reluctantly go on another mission to save the world from an evil mad man, leaving their children behind. But when they get caught, the children must use their parents' gadgets to set them free and save the world.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Carmen is kidnapped in a virtual reality game designed by the children's new enemy (Playmaker), and it is up to (Johnny) to rescue his sister (Carmen) and save the world.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A victim of domestic abuse,Anna Poliatova, accepts an offer to become an undercover KGB assassin while working as a model. She shows indelible strength and fearsome determination to reach one goal: her freedom. But first, Anna must survive the conflicting agendas of the KGB and the CIA.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: After two secret agents are married and retired, they reluctantly go on another mission to save the world from an evil mad man, leaving their children behind. But when they get caught, the children must use their parents' gadgets to set them free and save the world.

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: Terrorists have cultivated a bomb on a public transportation bus. Once armed, the bus must stay above 50 mph to keep from exploding. An LAPD gets on the bus and tries to save as many people as he could from the tense situation.

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank (Bruce Willis) reunites his team. They're trying to track down a missing portable nuclear device. The team have to overcome an army of professional killers: terrorists, corrupt government officials, who are also after the weapon.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: When their newest job lands them in trouble with a local crime lord, two car thieves find that their only way out of their predicament is for them to agree to steal the prized car of the crime lord's rival.(c)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: When she returns to her childhood home to recover from a horrific car accident, Jessabelle confronts a ghost that has been awaiting her return, and has no intention of letting her go.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Carmen is kidnapped in a virtual reality game designed by the children's new enemy (Playmaker), and it is up to (Johnny) to rescue his sister (Carmen) and save the world.(n)

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank (Bruce Willis) reunites his team. They're trying to track down a missing portable nuclear device. The team have to overcome an army of professional killers: terrorists, corrupt government officials, who are also after the weapon.(n)

programme.title: Enemy
programme.desc: Adam Bell is a glum, disheveled history professor, who seems disinterested even in his beautiful girlfriend, Mary. Watching a movie on the recommendation of a colleague, Adam spots his double, a bit-part actor named Anthony Clair, and decides to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: When their newest job lands them in trouble with a local crime lord, two car thieves find that their only way out of their predicament is for them to agree to steal the prized car of the crime lord's rival.(n)

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: The movie is set in an international flight from New York to London. During that trip, Bill Marks (Liam Neeson) receives several threats from an unknown threat that every 20 minutes a passenger will be killed unless $ 150 million is transferred to a bank account. The twist occurs when the owner of this account is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: A spin-off to The Fast and the Furious franchise, where US diplomatic agent, Luke Hobbs, unexpectedly allies with outcast Deckard Shaw to save the world from a cyber-genetically enhanced villain.(n)

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, an unlikely partnership is formed between an ex-con and an undercover cop in the walled-off Detroit. With a local kingpin threatening to destroy the whole city, the two men must find a common ground in order to bring him down.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) finds himself face to face against Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson) the Expendables co-founder who betrayed him. Now Conrad has become one of the toughest criminals, Barney recruits a new generation for the team to help him eliminate his arch enemy.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming a professional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: With her impending deportation looming closer, Margaret strongarms her assistant Andrew into marrying her to secure her stay in the US. But what begins as a business arrangement takes a swerve into romance as Margaret accompanies Andrew to his hometown, and they start to fall for each other.

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mia, an ambitious actress, who serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as their success rises they are faced with decisions that begin to affect the fragile fabric of their love relationship, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other are started to threaten to rip them apart.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: In the middle of the day, a group of four armed men led by Ryder hijack a New York subway train. Ryder informs Walter Garber, the train dispatcher, that he will start murdering the hostages if he doesn't receive ten million dollars within an hour. This puts Garber in a suspicious position.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(c)

programme.title: Drive
programme.desc: After a robbery does not go as planned, a price is put on the head of the enigmatic driver, Hollywood film stunt driver, motor-mechanic and sometime getaway man. He is a man who prefers to keep himself to himself but an unexpected attraction to a neighbor gets him involved in a situation that is rolling desperately out of control.

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A motorcycle stunt rider (Ryan Gosling) makes a fateful decision to carry out robberies to support his girlfriend and baby. When a rookie cop (Bradley Cooper) pursues him, the two become locked on a tense collision course whose devastating consequences will impact their families for years to come.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: A strange man accuses a writer of stealing his story, and starts to pursue him. They both start to prove their ownership to the same story, but events take a turn for the deadly.(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Jill was kidnapped two years ago, and is haunted by the incident even after she was rescued. When she gets home one day to find her little sister gone, she is convinced that she's kidnapped by the same person who abducted her two years before. When she goes to the police she is met with disbelief, and decides to take matters in her own hands to save her sister.(n)

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: After losing his wife and daughter in a plane crash, Roman struggles to move on when there is no justice to be found from the airline that caused the accident. His grief leads him to take drastic measures as he pursues the air traffic controller who inadvertently caused the crash.(n)

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: During an assignment to cover the war in Afghanistan, American journalist Kim Baker visits the soldiers' camps and shares some of their training and activities, eventually starting a wild relationship with a Scottish journalist.(n)

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every imaginable and unimaginable way.(n)

programme.desc: A scientist is exposed to Gamma rays while conducting his research, which makes him change into the Green Hulk when he gets angry, causing plenty of damage. programme.desc: After a ruthless biker gang rolls into town looking to cause chaos, a former Texas Ranger with a troubled past is forced to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: During a celebration, the Chef of the nefarious Bergens kidnaps a number of Trolls, all with the aim of serving them to the Troll-hungry Bergens. It's up to Princess Poppy and the grumpy Branch to find their friends before they become a meal for the Bergens.

programme.title: Clemency
programme.desc: Having spent years of her life working as a prison warden in a maximum-security prison, Bernadine Williams must question her role when she forms a bond with an inmate who is soon to be executed, forcing her to determine the thin line between good intentions and deadly desires.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Mother and Child
programme.desc: The life of three women who have one thing in common: adoption issues, as one of them regrets the daughter she gave up for adoption, the second was an adopted child herself, and the third is a married woman who has no hope for conceiving a child and considers adoption instead.

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter, who has recently become a congressman, is forced to construct an ark to save all the animals and people after receiving a dire flood warning from God.

programme.title: A Score to Settle
programme.desc: After 19 years in prison, a former enforcer for the mob is released to seek revenge on the mob bosses who got him wrongfully convicted. But as he reconnects with his son, he has to decide if their newfound relationship is worth more to him than his revenge.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Kate's life in an unmitigated mess. Despite her dreams of being a singer, she finds herself stuck working as an elf in a year-round Christmas shop. But Kate's life starts to look up when Tom enters her life. Perhaps he can put an end to her string of bad decisions.

programme.title: Mother and Child
programme.desc: The life of three women who have one thing in common: adoption issues, as one of them regrets the daughter she gave up for adoption, the second was an adopted child herself, and the third is a married woman who has no hope for conceiving a child and considers adoption instead.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Following their divorce, Daniel Hillard's wife takes custody of the children, leaving Daniel to look for a way to see his children. Daniel eventually disguises himself as a housekeeper named Mrs. Doubtfire and convinces his ex-wife to hire him as a nanny.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Stuart Shepard, is a cheating husband who works as a publicist, and uses the pay phone to call his girlfriend because his wife looks over the phone bills. One day the phone rings, and he answers it, only to be threatened by a sniper who threatens him with death if he hangs up the call or leaves the booth. A red point appearing on Stuart's forehead confirms that the sniper is serious.

programme.title: Running with the Devil
programme.desc: When a drug supply line gets disrupted and a shipment goes missing, the head of a drug cartel becomes determined to figure out what is going on. He sends two of his men to examine each stop on the supply chain in a perilous journey that exposes them to both criminals and pursuing cops.

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: A single mother confronts corrupt police officers when they inform her that her missing child is found. She suspects that the child is not hers and after numerous complaints and presenting evidence to prove her claims she gets detained in a mental institution, which holds other women who stepped on police's toes.(n)

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, live together in a small village of vegetable farmers. Days before the annual giant vegetable growing contest, everyone is surprised to find out that the rabbits are attacking their vegetables. The reason is due to one of Wallace's inventions, and together they try to find a way to solve the dilemma.(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth

One day the phone rings, and he answers it, only to be threatened by a sniper who threatens him with death if he hangs up the call or leaves the booth. A red point appearing on Stuart's forehead confirms that the sniper is serious.(n)

programme.title: Anthem of a Teenage Prophet
programme.desc: The life of the teenager Luke turns upside down when he finds out that he can foresee the death of other people. As his premonitions become true, he struggles to fit in a community that considers him a freak.(n)

programme.title: Running with the Devil
programme.desc: When a drug supply line gets disrupted and a shipment goes missing, the head of a drug cartel becomes determined to figure out what is going on. He sends two of his men to examine each stop on the supply chain in a perilous journey that exposes them to both criminals and pursuing cops.(n)

programme.title: Alhisab yajmae
programme.desc: The story takes place inside the world of domestic servants , where a woman from a local area called Naima runs an office for maids and cooking food for events, and through her work and her diverse relationships we discover many hidden secrets and endless problems.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: Seberg
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film depicts the life of the French New Wave icon, Jean Seberg, whose political activism and her romantic relationship with Hakim Jamal, a civil activist as well, made her a target to Hoover's FBI.(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter, who has recently become a congressman, is forced to construct an ark to save all the animals and people after receiving a dire flood warning from God.(n)

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Desperate to afford his daughter's surgery, Luke Vaughn agrees with a coworker to rob the casino they work in. When the heist goes south, they are forced on the run, leading them to take a city bus hostage as they try to flee both the cops and their gangster boss's hitman.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) a successful New York City lawyer, goes through a bold turn in his family life. As he goes home from work one night ,and hides in his garage attic peeping from there, secretly watching the impact of his disappearance on his wife (Jennifer Garner) and family.(n)

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: With Christmas coming up, the festivities on campus take a turn when a psychotic killer starts to pick sorority girls off one by one. As the body count rises, a squad of sorority sisters decides that they won't just wait around to be killed, leading them to uncover a vast conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Seberg
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film depicts the life of the French New Wave icon, Jean Seberg, whose political activism and her romantic relationship with Hakim Jamal, a civil activist as well, made her a target to Hoover's FBI.(n)

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: With his life rapidly going down the drain, a depressed executive finds an innovative way of communication by adopting a beaver hand-puppet that helps him work through his issues and start to reach out to his family.(n)
